```{r}
# Load the libraries.
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
```

```{r}
# Read in data saved as a CSV file.
dat <- read.csv("/Users/timvigers/Documents/School/UC Denver/Biostatistics/Statistical Consulting 1/Homework 6/data.csv")
# Plot age and BP.
ggplot(data = dat,aes(x = Age,y = BP,color = Drug,label = L.D)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_label(show.legend = F) +
  ggtitle("Age and Blood Pressure") + 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
